resources.string:
Thank you for downloading Ultimate Utility Master app from Google Play Store. This app includes some handy utility tools for nerds or common individuals. I update this app regularly to add new features and to fix out reported bugs. 

You may change some settings in the settings page in this app to further enhance your experience. Please note that we do not record or share any of your data posted to this application in any way. So feel assured that your data is never compromised. 

Please enjoy the app and do share your feedback, suggestions and questions about the app. I will be happy to learn from your idaeas and improve the app over time.
